items.sentence: There are still people who believe that the earth is flat.
Tom thought it was Mary who had broken into his apartment.
Tom thinks it would be better not to visit Mary right now.
Tom wanted one, but he had no idea where he could get one.
Tom was a better cook than Mary was when they got married.
Have you told Tom about what happened yesterday at school?
Tom told me that he thought that he might be able do that.
The money will probably be split evenly between those two.
Tom said he didn\'t have enough money to buy a motorcycle.
Tom said he didn\'t want to spend any more time in Boston.
